title: 天皇賞（春）の後に・勝利後と次の夢

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I did it, I did it...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I won!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
...
I lost.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I thought I'd gotten stronger with Tannhauser-san pushing me from behind...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: Rice-san!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: B-Bourbon-san!?

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
It was a wonderful race.
I wanted to tell you that.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I'll be able to return soon.
So let's fight together again.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
...!
Yeah... yeah!

text_block_list.name: Interviewer A
text_block_list.text: Congratulations on a wonderful victory!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, thank you.
I'm so happy!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: McQueen-san and Rice-san were so intense with their fighting spirit.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I wasn't sure how it would turn out, but I'm glad I could give it my best.

text_block_list.name: Interviewer A
text_block_list.text: By the way, have you decided on your next target race?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Well, I'm thinking I'd like to run on another big stage like this one next time.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: So yeah, I'd really like to run in the 'Takarazuka Kinen'.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: I'll do my best to win next time too!
And so, it was decided that my next race would be the 'Takarazuka Kinen'.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Phew...
The morning track is so quiet.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hmm, the 'Takarazuka Kinen' is a 2200m turf race, right-handed, right? That means——
Haaah——!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Hah, hah...! Not yet...!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I have to improve like Rice-san and Tannhauser-san too...!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Until I unleash the frustration from the 'Tenno Sho (Spring)' onto the 'Takarazuka Kinen'!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Amazing... McQueen isn't backing down...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Mmm. Okay, I have to do my best too...!
The days of running hard toward the medium distance G1 race 'Takarazuka Kinen' in two months began!
